title: JSON schema for the Angular Package Builder configuration file

allowJs.description: Allow javascript files to be compiled.

allowSyntheticDefaultImports.description: Allow default imports from modules with no default export. This does not affect code emit, just typechecking.

allowUnreachableCode.description: Do not report errors on unreachable code.

allowUnusedLabels.description: Do not report errors on unused labels.

alwaysStrict.description: Parse in strict mode and emit 'use strict' for each source file. Requires TypeScript version 2.1 or later.

checkJs.description: Report errors in .js files. Requires TypeScript version 2.3 or later.

downlevelIteration.description: Provide full support for iterables in 'for-of', spread, and destructuring when targeting 'ES5' or 'ES3'. Requires TypeScript version 2.3 or later.

forceConsistentCasingInFileNames.description: Disallow inconsistently-cased references to the same file.

maxNodeModuleJsDepth.description: The maximum dependency depth to search under node_modules and load JavaScript files. Only applicable with --allowJs.

noFallthroughCasesInSwitch.description: Report errors for fallthrough cases in switch statement.

noImplicitAny.description: Warn on expressions and declarations with an implied 'any' type.

noImplicitReturns.description: Report error when not all code paths in function return a value.

noImplicitThis.description: Raise error on 'this' expressions with an implied any type.

noImplicitUseStrict.description: Do not emit 'use strict' directives in module output.

noLib.description: Do not include the default library file (lib.d.ts).

noStrictGenericChecks.description: Disable strict checking of generic signatures in function types.

noUnusedLocals.description: Report errors on unused locals. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

noUnusedParameters.description: Report errors on unused parameters. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

preserveConstEnums.description: Do not erase const enum declarations in generated code.

preserveSymlinks.description: Do not resolve symlinks to their real path; treat a symlinked file like a real one.

removeComments.description: Do not emit comments to output.

skipLibCheck.description: Skip type checking of declaration files. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

strict.description: Enable all strict type checking options. Requires TypeScript version 2.3 or later.

strictNullChecks.description: Enable strict null checks. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

stripInternal.description: Do not emit declarations for code that has an '@internal' annotation.

suppressExcessPropertyErrors.description: Suppress excess property checks for object literals.

suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors.description: Suppress noImplicitAny errors for indexing objects lacking index signatures.

typeRoots.description: Specify list of directories for type definition files to be included. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

types.description: Type declaration files to be included in compilation. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

annotateForClosureCompiler.description: Insert JSDoc type annotations needed by Closure Compiler
